articles.description: A new trailer for Crysis Remastered leaked online. Fans reacted so poorly, Crytek delayed the game. It’s still headed to Nintendo Switch, PS4, Windows PC, and Xbox One.
articles.content: Crytek had been planning to reveal a remastered version of the original Crysis today, but the video leaked a little bit early on YouTube. Fans reacted poorly, and now the reveal and the game release … [+1188 chars]
